control.visible: Player.HasVideo + [Control.IsVisible(52) | Control.IsVisible(53) | Control.IsVisible(506) | Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(514) | Control.IsVisible(516) | Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(510) | Control.IsVisible(57) | [[Control.IsVisible(501) | Control.IsVisible(504) | Control.IsVisible(503) | Control.IsVisible(508)] + !Control.IsVisible(7550)] | [[Control.IsVisible(509) | Control.IsVisible(513)] + !Control.IsVisible(7679)]]

include.name: AutoConfig
include.onload: Skin.SetString(submenulist,music tv movies pvr custom1 custom2 custom3 custom4 custom5 custom6 videos programs settings shutdown weather)
